58253.「ムニュムニュ……。だ～れ？\n ママなら クスリをかいにいって\n いまは い:
Munch, munch, munch... who's that? My mom went
to get some pills, but she's not here right
now, so...

58255.「わーい わーい！ こんなに ちかくで\n モーモンたん みるの はじめてー！\:
Yay! Yay! I've never seen Teeny Sanguini this
close before! Wow, amazing!

58256.<if_woman>「ねえねえ おねえちゃん。\n このモーモンたん おねえちゃ:
Hey, hey, young lady. Is this Mormont Boy your young lady's? Why are you so happy to go with her? Hey, hey, young
man. Is this Mormontan your young man's? Why are you so happy to be with us?

58257.<if_woman>「……へえ～。おねえちゃん\n まものつかいっていう おしご:
...Wow! So you're doing a job called a
"Monster Master", huh? How cool!

58258.「カーヤ。ただいまー。\n いい子に して……: Kaya. I'm home. Be a good girl...

58260.「カーヤ！ 危険だわ！\n 下がってなさい！: Kaya! It's not safe! Stay back!

58262.「この魔物を 部屋に入れたのは あなたね！？\n いったい どういうつもり？\n:
You're the one who put this monster in my
room! What the hell are you doing? Take your
monster and get the hell out of here!

58265.「いいぞ ファーベル！\n 剣を振る姿が なかなか サマになってきた。:
Way to go, Fabel! The way you're wielding that
sword is looking pretty good.

58266.「よし この辺で ひと息入れよう。: Okay, let's take a break here.

58267.「アンタ……。\n 前に ウチの中で 会ったよな。\n たしか <pc>って言っ:
You... we met before inside my house. Did I
say <pc>?

58268.「ハハァン。母さんが頼みごとをした\n まもの使いって アンタだな？:
Ha-ha-ha. You're the one who sent the Monster
Master that Mom asked for, aren't you?

58269.「それで どうだった？\n モーモンで 女の子を元気づけるっていう\n 母さんの:
So, how'd it go? Did my mom's plan to cheer up
the girls with Teeny Sanguini work?<yesno><close>

58270.「はははっ！ マジメに答えなくても\n その暗い顔を見れば わかるよ。\n どう:
Ha ha ha! You don't have to answer seriously,
I can tell by your dark face. You got turned
away and came back anyway, didn't you?

58271.「魔物は しょせん 魔物。\n 怖がられて きらわれて……\n それが 当然の存:
Monsters are just monsters. They are to be
feared and feared... that's the way they
should be.

58273.「……っと 自己紹介が 遅れたな。\n オレは デイラー。旅のバトルマスターだ。:
I'm a little late in introducing myself. I'm
Dailer. I am a traveling battle master.

58274.「少し前に ファーベルと知り合って\n ヤツに 剣を教えたりしている。\n まあ:
I met Fabel a while ago and have been teaching
him how to use a sword. Well, it's what we
call a master-student relationship.

58275.「ファーベルは……\n どうやら 魔物がらみで\n つらい過去が あるみたいなん:
Fabel... seems to have a painful past related
to monsters.

58276.「だから まもの使いを見ると\n つい あんな態度を取ってしまうらしい。\n 大:
That's why he has such a bad attitude when he
sees a Monster Master. Please tolerate him.

58277.「デイラーさん。いつまで おしゃべりしてるの？\n 今日は お城の方まで 修行に:
Mr. Dailer. How long are we going to talk
about this? You're going to the castle today
to train, right? Come on, let's go.

58278.「ああ そうだったな！\n わかった！ すぐ行くよ！:
Oh, yeah, right! Okay, I'm on my way! I'll be
right there!

58279.「それじゃ オレたちは これで。: Well then, we'll be going now.
